document.full_text: mr. weinglass was at the center of many contentious cases, including the chicago seven, the pentagon papers and the hearst kidnapping.
document.title: leonard i. weinglass, lawyer, dies at 77; defended renegades and the notorious
lines_and_colors: mr. weinglass was at the center of many contentious cases, including the chicago seven, the pentagon papers and the hearst kidnapping.
